Text:
So let me understand this -- does TPB routinely CENSORS ed2k links? How about these?

ed2k://|file|Mayflower.1of2.avi|2206033920|6E76795EC29B09A2A87C6029E15B0EF1|/

ed2k://|file|Mayflower.2of2.avi|621561266|D41B5A5B596B867D138C103A130EA9BC|/
Good! ed2k links only produce "Database error" if they're long. Shortening the title and omitting "h=..." leaves the links still valid.
